act1: In this activity, we are going to learn the tense conversion.
act2: A sentence is given in a particular tense.
act3: We need to select the desired tense from the second dropdown menu.
act4: Drag and drop the correct verb and helping verb.
instr1: Select the tense from the dropdown menu.
instr2: Drag and drop the correct main and helping verb and click on the "SUBMIT" button.
instr3: Click on the "NEXT" button to get the next sentence.
instr4: Click on the "SHOW ANSWER" button to see the answer sentence.
q_instr2: The quiz will start after clicking on the "OK" button, along with a timer.
q_instr3: To select an option as an answer to a given question, click on it.
q_instr4: You will get two attempts to select the correct option to the question.
q_instr5: You may skip the question if you want.
q_instr6: The score and timing are displayed on the top of the screen throughout the quiz.
q_instr7: You will get +1 for each correct answer. There is no negative marking.
q_instr8: The scorecard will be generated at the end of the quiz.
proc1: The mainpage is as shown in figure below. [Refer Fig. 1]
proc2: Select tense from the dropdown menu. [Refer Fig. 2]
proc3: The sentence of selected tense will appear on the screen.
proc4: The sentence to be formed in required tense comes with blank space in place main and helping verb.
proc5: Drag and drop the correct main and helping verb and then click on the "SUBMIT" button.
proc6: The correct and incorrect feedback is as shown in figure below. [Refer Fig. 3 & Fig. 4]
proc7: Click on the "NEXT" button to get the next sentence.
wawgtl: What are we going to learn?
aysywtq: Are you sure you want to quit?
